definitions.text: especially a leaf of grass or the broad portion of a leaf as distinct from the petiole

examples: gay young blades bragged of their amorous adventures

definitions.text: something long and thin resembling a blade of grass
examples: a blade of lint on his suit

definitions.text: a cutting or thrusting weapon that has a long metal blade and a hilt with a hand guard
a cut of beef from the shoulder blade
a broad flat body part (as of the shoulder or tongue)
the part of the skate that slides on the ice
flat surface that rotates and pushes against air or water
the flat part of a tool or weapon that (usually) has a cutting edge
